subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN5592 is on the way
description_text:
It's been 3 business days and my package hasn't even been picked up,
despite paying for the quicker, more expensive shipping method. The other
half of my order hasn't even been given a label.

conversations.body_text: Hi Matt Coley,    Your package was shipped in two separate shipments. One has already been delivered.  Your package is currently in transit and is expected to arrive within the next few days. Below is your tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=887601089940,SF6047224805290
